title: Creating Clash Team (TOP, JG, Supp, AD available)
body:
Hey guys, just decided to start building my own team (Cause I'm done waiting lol)

All lanes available (except mid lane, which is my main).

Not pretty strong requirements but:

- At least Gold 3 + in both queues (Solo and Flex)
- Regular

That's it, just add me in game and send me a message with your role.

replies.body: D4 Supp here and my duo is a D2 adc player, feel free to add me!
Hey man, if you can add me on league that would be sweet
